page.title: 09THE CHURCH, TORTHORWALD
page.content: {Sunday School} 23 children go to the Sunday School every week from 10.00 _ 11.00am. The children get split into three groups. There are three teachers. One takes the small ones, one takes the oldest children. We read out of the Bible and sing hymns and pray. {Church} Every Sunday at Torthorwald church a service is held from 12.15 _ 1.15pm. Every week there are about 30 people go. It is not very busy. They sing hymns, say prayers and read out of the Bible. The church has a split parish: Collin, Kirkmichael and Torthorwald share the same minister who takes three services every Sunday. The building itself is very old. The church is in the shape of a cross.
